channel.title: Authors on Spyros Kyriazos
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Spyros Kyriazos

item.description:
I’m Spyros Kyriazos. I hold a degree in Digital Systems and a Master’s Degree in Network-Oriented Systems.

With over a decade of experience in software design and development, I have consistently leveraged technology to enhance productivity and improve services for both end-users and the Greek public sector.

In the realm of home automation, I am passionate about designing systems that improve daily life, reduce stress, and ensure privacy. My goal is to empower home automation enthusiasts with the knowledge and resources to create their perfect home automation setup.
